arts.ttl: Juventus Director Giuntoli: “We’ve been following Hancko for some time”
arts.sum: Juventus sporting director Cristiano Giuntoli spoke ahead of the team's match against Monza, addressing the club's upcoming transfer strategies and potential player movements. With the January transfer window approaching, Giuntoli confirmed that the club is keenly interested in bolstering their defensive options, specifically mentioning Feyenoord defender David Hancko. The post Juventus Director Giuntoli: “We’ve been following Hancko for some time” appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Eredivisie Round Up: PSV defeat Feyenoord as Utrecht capitulate
arts.sum: Below is a round up of all the action from the Eredivisie on Sunday including PSV Eindhoven against Feyenoord. Sparta Rotterdam 0-2 Ajax Ajax ended the year with a victory over a struggling Sparta Rotterdam. Ajax opted for a 5-3-2 formation but without real wingbacks and the first half saw neither side really create any […] The post Eredivisie Round Up: PSV defeat Feyenoord as Utrecht capitulate appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Eredivisie predictions including PSV Eindhoven vs. Feyenoord
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Eredivisie fixtures, including PSV Eindhoven vs. Feyenoord.

arts.ttl: PSV receive €20m Premier League bid for USMNT star Ricardo Pepi
arts.sum: According to Rik Elfrink, that is not enough to convince PSV to let him leave: "If a club wants to sign Pepi and buy out his contract that runs until 2028, a lot more money will probably have to be put on the table." The transfer turmoil surrounding Ricardo Pepi is entering a new phase, as PSV have reportedly received an official bid of €20 million, according to reports.

arts.ttl: 'I can tell that boy is hungry' - USMNT legend Jozy Altidore offers advice to PSV's Ricardo Pepi after Premier League team makes offer
arts.sum: With the Pepi news, Altidore offered perspective on his decision to leave the Eredivisie for the Premier League a decade ago Like many in the American soccer scene Thursday, Altidore was surprised to to see GOAL's report that an unnamed Premier League has bid for Pepi, a deal that is said to be $20.7 million.

arts.ttl: USMNT star Ricardo Pepi gets Premier League offer
arts.sum: The form of PSV and USMNT striker Ricardo Pepi has caught attention this year and the El Paso-born star could soon be leaving the Netherlands. Pepi, still only 21 years old, has scored 10 goals in 15 Eredivisie appearances this season, despite having only started five games.

arts.ttl: Preview: PSV Eindhoven vs. Feyenoord - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Eredivisie clash between PSV Eindhoven and Feyenoord, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Revealed: How Pep Guardiola got THAT cut to his nose after his Man City side spurned three-goal lead against Feyenoord - as Guillem Balague gives insight into manager's 'self-doubt' and 'nervousness'
arts.sum: The picture of the Spaniard sporting scratches on his head and a gash on his nose came to sum up City's woes this season which reached a new level after the Champions League draw.
